summary: 2005 CHEVY COBALT, WHILE MY DAUGHTER WAS DRIVING THIS CAR, SHE LOST POWER, MOTOR WAS REVVING, RPM GOING UP, THEN ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON. TOOK TO 2 CHEVY DEALERSHIPS, 12 CODES CAME UP, BUT WAS TOLD NONE WOULD MAKE IT DO "THAT"... HELP!! WHAT IF SHE IS ON HIGHWAY AND LOSES POWER, SOMEONE CAN BE KILLED...  *TR
